duties_responsibilities.duty: Receive all service calls and work order requests for a large Government facility and other smaller sites within the DC Metro area.
Enter the data into either a computerized maintenance management system (MAXIMO) or an automated database (Products & Services Catalog).
Handle all inbound and outbound calls in a professional, customer-focused manner.
Research, review, and complete all DC Metro area external work requests for non-contracted sites.
Assemble, format, and/or author routine correspondence using MS Office applications.
Maintain electronic and manual files and resources.
Demonstrate proficient use of computers and computer software for recording, modifying, and tracking data.
Report employee queries and call-offs, and support company safety guidelines.
Provide shift coverage between 6am and 5pm, and serve as backup for the Building Operations Specialist.
Follow all policies and procedures, and perform other assigned duties.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent, with additional training in the use of computers for data entry, word processing, reporting/spreadsheets, etc
